H0.text: In which month is the Gaelic festival of Beltane traditionally celebrated . April

H1.text: In which month is the Gaelic festival of Beltane traditionally celebrated . June

H2.text: In which month is the Gaelic festival of Beltane traditionally celebrated . March

H3.text: In which month is the Gaelic festival of Beltane traditionally celebrated . MAY

A4.text: It is traditionally held on 1 May, or about midway between the spring equinox and summer solstice.

A5.text: The medieval tale Tochmarc Emire (The Wooing of Emer) gives the same description of Beltaine. It says that it marks the beginning of summer
